title: MeeBOX
body:
Is a new comedy show by Adam Buxton, who kindly helped us with our Web Casting. Jonny did the music for the show, and it's on BBC3, this Sunday 22nd June, at 11.45pm, and then again on Thursday 26th.
It's also on all next week on bbc's iplayer.

Here are some linky tasters


FUNKY SONGS OF PRAISE

SAUSAGES

TODAY ON XANTIAR



We will be dialling in after our German Festival tomorrow night.

Tchuss!
